description:
Shopify strives to be an ever moving company. With a strong force of
hundreds in the R&D team, the challenges to keep delivering and shipping
scaled accordingly.

From a manual CLI that only ops could execute just a few years back, to
today’s automatic 180+ deploys a day, this talk will highlight the
different tools, processes and integrations used throughout the team
that fuels today's scale.

Jean-Philippe Caissy Bio
------------------------

Jean-Philippe is a senior software developer at Shopify, working in
their Montreal's office. For the past 4 years, he helped organized the
local Montréal-Python user group. A seasoned Python and Ruby developer,
he likes to talk about scaling problems.
title: From idea to production in 20 minutes: engineering at scale
